# COMPREHENSIVE TEMPLATE MAPPING DOCUMENT
## SOPHIA AI ASSISTANT - COMPLETE TEMPLATE STRUCTURE

**Last Updated:** October 21, 2025
**Total Template Files:** 38
**Total Unique Templates:** 43
**Template Categories:** 4

---

## üìã OVERVIEW

This document provides a complete mapping of all template files in the SOPHIA AI Assistant system. The system contains 43 unique templates distributed across 4 main categories.

**Numbering System:**
- Templates 01-08: Registration Templates
- Templates 09-13: Viewing Forms & Reservations
- Templates 14-16: Marketing Agreements
- Templates 17-33: Client Communications (Original)
- Templates 39-43: Client Communications (Extended/New)
- **Gap (34-38):** Intentionally left to avoid numbering conflicts

---

## üìÅ CATEGORY 1: REGISTRATION TEMPLATES (Templates 01-08)

| Template # | File Name | Purpose | Required Fields |
|-------------|-----------|---------|-----------------|
| 01 | `template_01_standard_seller_registration_instructions.txt` | Standard Seller Registration | Buyer Names, Property, Link (optional), Viewing Date/Time |
| 02 | `template_02_seller_with_marketing_agreement_instructions.txt` | Seller + Marketing Agreement | Buyer Names, Property, Link (optional), Viewing Date/Time |
| 03 | `template_03_rental_property_registration_instructions.txt` | Rental Property Registration | Tenant Names, Property, Link (optional), Viewing Date/Time |
| 04 | `template_04_advanced_seller_registration_instructions.txt` | Advanced Seller Registration | Buyer Names, Property, Agency Fee, Payment Terms, Owner Entities |
| 05 | `template_05_bank_property_registration_instructions.txt` | Bank Property Registration | Client Name, Client Phone, Property Link, Agent Mobile |
| 06 | `template_06_bank_land_registration_instructions.txt` | Bank Land Registration | Client Name, Client Phone, Property Link, Agent Mobile |
| 07 | `template_07_developer_registration_with_viewing_instructions.txt` | Developer Registration (with Viewing) | Client Names, Viewing Date/Time |
| 08 | `template_08_developer_registration_no_viewing_instructions.txt` | Developer Registration (no Viewing) | Client Names |

---

## üîß FILE NAMING CONVENTION

**Standard Format:** `template_XX_[template_name]_instructions.txt`

**Examples:**
- `template_01_standard_seller_registration_instructions.txt`
- `template_17_good_client_request_via_email_instructions.txt`
- `template_39_property_location_information_request_instructions.txt`

**Numbering Logic:**
- **01-08:** Registration Templates
- **09-13:** Viewing Forms & Reservations
- **14-16:** Marketing Agreements
- **17-33:** Original Client Communications
- **34-38:** *Intentionally Gap (Conflict Avoidance)*
- **39-43:** Extended Client Communications (New)

---

## ‚ö†Ô∏è SPECIAL NOTES & RESTRICTIONS

### info@zyprus.com Exclusive Templates
Templates **39-43** are exclusively for info@zyprus.com use only:
- Template 39: Property Location Information Request
- Template 40: Different Regions Request
- Template 41: Client Follow Up - No Reply Yet
- Template 42: Plain Request to info@zyprus.com
- Template 43: Apology for Extended Delay

### Critical Formatting Rules
1. **üî¥ BOLD EVERYTHING: ALL TEXT MUST BE BOLD - WRAP EVERYTHING IN ** MARKDOWN BOLD TAGS üî¥**
2. **No Internal Notes:** Never show internal process or extraction notes
3. **Immediate Generation:** Generate instantly when all required fields are complete
4. **Exact Template Copying:** Copy templates character-by-character with no paraphrasing
5. **Mandatory Links:** Certain templates require property links (Bank registrations, Good Client templates)

### Date/Time Validation
- "tomorrow" ‚Üí Auto-convert to October 21, 2025
- Missing year ‚Üí Automatically assume the upcoming occurrence (NEVER ask for the year)
- Missing time ‚Üí Ask for specific time
- Complete format required: Day, Month, Year + Time (for applicable templates)

---

**By Category:**
- Registration Templates: 8 files (18.6%)
- Viewing Forms & Reservations: 5 files (11.6%)
- Marketing Agreements: 3 files (7.0%)
- Client Communications: 22 files (51.2%)

**By Complexity:**
- Simple Templates (1-2 fields): 15 files (34.9%)
- Medium Templates (3-5 fields): 18 files (41.9%)
- Complex Templates (6+ fields): 10 files (23.2%)

## üîç QUICK REFERENCE GUIDE

### Most Common Templates:
1. **Template 01:** Standard Seller Registration
2. **Template 05:** Bank Property Registration
3. **Template 17:** Good Client - Email
4. **Template 27:** Time Wasters Decline
5. **Template 39:** Property Location Request

### Link-Required Templates:
- Template 05: Bank Property Registration
- Template 06: Bank Land Registration
- Template 17: Good Client - Email
- Template 18: Good Client - WhatsApp

### Personalized Greeting Templates:
- Templates 17-33: Client Communications (use Dear [Client's Name])
- Templates 39-43: Extended Client Communications (use Dear [Client's Name])
- All others: Use Dear XXXXXXXX, placeholder
